page.title: 09HADLEY LANE
page.content: The start of{Hadley Lane}is marked by a modern detached house owned by the {Young family.}After this the lane goes up a steep hill with no houses.The lane is bordered by an overgrown mixture of hawthorn and holly.On the right the hedge boarders fields where cows and sheep are kept. The houses are all old until the top of the hill.On the right is a group of modern houses.On the left is a recently built group of stables owned by a{Mr Walker.}There is also an adjoining building where he keeps some of his collection of old vehicles.He also owns a small courtyard by the {Hole in the Wall}.Past the stables on the left are two old semi-detached houses made of brick. By {Deiniol Roberts.
